description: Seamus O' Reilly is stacked on top of Brian Bonds atop a padded fuck-bench. Jacob Peterson takes turns rimming both hunks smooth holes. Jacob gears up with some gloves and lube and puts one fist in Brian and the other in Seamus. Like the good sex pigs they are, they take each punch that Jacob gives them. Switching positions, Brian and Seamus bend over the fuck-bench next to each other while Jacob has them to ride his fists. When they've had enough, they sit and send all three of their loads rocketing into the air.
title: The Abysse, Part 1, Scene #09
